Package com.example.cs213_tuition_project_javafx

Class TuitionManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cs213_tuition_project_javafx.TuitionManagerController
public class TuitionManagerController extends Object
Bridge class between JavaFX GUI and backend Java files. Controls all events on the GUI Controls all exception handling for GUI errors

    onAddButtonClick()
    Adds student to roster when add button on roster page has been clicked.

    Changes students Major to a given major when change button on roster page has been clicked.
    void

    Deletes student from roster when add button on roster page has been clicked.
    void
    onDropButtonClick()
    Drops EnrollStudent object from enrollment when enroll button on enroll page has been clicked.

    Adds EnrollStudent object to enrollment when enroll button on enroll page has been clicked.
    void
    onEnrollmentPrintClick()
    Event Handler to display enrollment in console.
    void
    onLoadFileButtonClick()
    Loads students into the roster from data given in a text file.
    void
    onMajorPrintButtonClick()
    Prints roster sorted by School and Major, and displays it in console Event handler for (Roster --> Print By School And Major) button
    void
    onNormalPrintButtonClick()
    Prints roster sorted by Profile, and displays it in console Event handler for (Roster --> Print By Profile) button
    void
    onRBSClick()
    Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend RBS (Rutgers business school) Displays output in console on print tab.
    void
    onSASCLick()
    Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend SAS (School of Ars and Sciences) Displays output in console on print tab.
    void
    onSCIClick()
    Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend SC and I (School of Communication and Information) Displays output in console on print tab.
    void
    onSemesterEndClick()
    Event Handler to run semester end functions, and display the results in the console.
    void
    onSOEClick()
    Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend SOE (School of Engineering) Displays output in console on print tab.
    void
    onStandingPrintButtonClick()
    Prints roster sorted by Standing, and displays it in console Event handler for (Roster --> Print By Standing) button
    void
    onTuitionDueClick()
    Event Handler to display Tuition Due for student enrolled this semester, in the console.
    void
    onUpdateScholarshipButtonClick()
    Method to handle event that scholarship update button is clicked on scholarship tab.
    void
    switchOffInternational()
    Turns off isStudyAbroad button when international button is deselected
    void
    switchOffTriState()
    Turns off CT, NY toggle group
    void
    switchToInternational()
    Turns off CT, NY toggle group and turns on isStudyAbroad button
    void
    switchToNonResident()
    Turns on the TriState, International, and Neither toggle group
    void
    switchToResident()
    Turns off all other buttons and deselected all other buttons except the Resident, NonResident toggle group
    void
    switchToTriState()
    Turns on the CT, NY toggle buttons when Tri-State button has been selected.

  • Constructor Details

    • TuitionManagerController

      public TuitionManagerController()
      Creates instance of class (NOT USED);

  • Method Details

    • switchToTriState

      public void switchToTriState()
      Turns on the CT, NY toggle buttons when Tri-State button has been selected.

    • switchToInternational

      public void switchToInternational()
      Turns off CT, NY toggle group and turns on isStudyAbroad button

    • switchOffInternational

      public void switchOffInternational()
      Turns off isStudyAbroad button when international button is deselected

    • switchOffTriState

      public void switchOffTriState()
      Turns off CT, NY toggle group

    • switchToResident

      public void switchToResident()
      Turns off all other buttons and deselected all other buttons except the Resident, NonResident toggle group

    • switchToNonResident

      public void switchToNonResident()
      Turns on the TriState, International, and Neither toggle group

    • onAddButtonClick

      public void onAddButtonClick()
      Adds student to roster when add button on roster page has been clicked. Takes in data from text fields on first tab

    • onDeleteButtonClick

      public void onDeleteButtonClick()
      Deletes student from roster when add button on roster page has been clicked. Takes in data from text fields on first tab

    • onChangeButtonClick

      public void onChangeButtonClick()
      Changes students Major to a given major when change button on roster page has been clicked. Takes in data from text fields on first tab

    • onLoadFileButtonClick

      public void onLoadFileButtonClick()
      Loads students into the roster from data given in a text file. Takes in data from file name text field on first tab

    • onEnrollButtonClick

      public void onEnrollButtonClick()
      Adds EnrollStudent object to enrollment when enroll button on enroll page has been clicked. First checks to see if the student is in the roster. Takes data from text fields in enroll tab.

    • onDropButtonClick

      public void onDropButtonClick()
      Drops EnrollStudent object from enrollment when enroll button on enroll page has been clicked. First checks to see if the student is in the enrollment. Takes data from text fields in enroll tab.

    • onUpdateScholarshipButtonClick

      public void onUpdateScholarshipButtonClick()
      Method to handle event that scholarship update button is clicked on scholarship tab. Takes in data from text fields on scholarship tab. Adds scholarship to resident objects (Checks to see if student object is a resident)

    • onNormalPrintButtonClick

      public void onNormalPrintButtonClick()
      Prints roster sorted by Profile, and displays it in console Event handler for (Roster --> Print By Profile) button

    • onMajorPrintButtonClick

      public void onMajorPrintButtonClick()
      Prints roster sorted by School and Major, and displays it in console Event handler for (Roster --> Print By School And Major) button

    • onStandingPrintButtonClick

      public void onStandingPrintButtonClick()
      Prints roster sorted by Standing, and displays it in console Event handler for (Roster --> Print By Standing) button

    • onRBSClick

      public void onRBSClick()
      Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend RBS (Rutgers business school) Displays output in console on print tab.

    • onSOEClick

      public void onSOEClick()
      Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend SOE (School of Engineering) Displays output in console on print tab.

    • onSASCLick

      public void onSASCLick()
      Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend SAS (School of Ars and Sciences) Displays output in console on print tab.

    • onSCIClick

      public void onSCIClick()
      Event handler function to print student currently in the roster, that all attend SC and I (School of Communication and Information) Displays output in console on print tab.

    • onEnrollmentPrintClick

      public void onEnrollmentPrintClick()
      Event Handler to display enrollment in console. Event triggers when (Enrollment + Print Enrolled Student) button is clicked

    • onTuitionDueClick

      public void onTuitionDueClick()
      Event Handler to display Tuition Due for student enrolled this semester, in the console. Event triggers when (Enrollment + Print Tuition Dues) button is clicked

    • onSemesterEndClick

      public void onSemesterEndClick()
      Event Handler to run semester end functions, and display the results in the console. Event triggers when (Enrollment + Semester End) button is clicked The program does not terminate after this. Instead, enrollment is cleared and a new semester may begin.
